details.location: Asia Pacific University, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
details.description: Google Cloud Platform Next 2016 Kuala Lumpur is a full day event of workshops and talks centered around the latest developments in cloud technology. There will be talks and workshops conduct by Google Developer Experts and industry experts.
details.get-ticket: Get your ticket now on Peatix

getting.title: Getting there
getting.event_name: Google Cloud Platform Next Extended 2016 Kuala Lumpur
getting.getting_description: We are hosting Google Cloud Platform Next Extended 2016 Kuala Lumpur at the Asia Pacific University, Kuala Lumpur.
getting.there-are-ways: There are few ways to come to

getting_method.method_description: If you are coming to APU by LRT, get off at the Bukit Jalil LRT station on the Sri Petaling Line. From the Bukit Jalil LRT station, it is a short cab ride to APU’s main campus (approx. RM 5 – RM 7)

If you are coming to APU by taxi, just inform the taxi driver that you need to be taken to 'Technology Park Malaysia' in Bukit Jalil. Once you are inside Technology Park, you will see boards that will point you to APU’s main campus. If you are using Grabcar simply search for, 'APIIT TPM'
If you are driving please find the location below:
